text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump coronavirus clearance/note to go back to work from ur dr, test centers, hospitals, pharmacies is an excellent idea. we get work clearance all the time to go back to work, even before c-virus.

https://t.co/TkVBWzIbbP
